a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Tax revenues as a share of GDP vs. GDP per capita, 2022
Taxes include direct and indirect taxes as well as social contributions. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation
and differences in living costs between countries.
Data source: UNU-WIDER Government Revenue Dataset (2023); Eurostat, OECD, and World Bank (2025)

Note: Tax revenue includes social contributions. GDP per capita is expressed in
international-$
at 2021 prices.
